text: The 1929-30 Austrian Football Championship was organized by the Vienna Football Association. A single-track II. League served as a substructure to the I. League. These leagues were only open to professional football clubs. Rapid Wien became champions for the 10th time in the club's history. Other federal state associations organized state championships in different modes on an amateur basis. The respective amateur national champions then also played for a champion at the amateur championship. Amateur champion became Kremser SC. The sports field misery in Vienna led to many teams playing their home games as part of double events or completely foregoing the home advantage and playing on the opponent's field. Only Rapid, Vienna, WAC, Wacker and Wiener Sport-Club played on their traditional home pitches. This was heavily criticized by the association.Austria Soccer ==Champions of the federal states == *Lower Austriaː Kremser SC *Salzburgː Salzburger AK 1914 *Styriaː GAK *Tyrolː Innsbrucker AC *Vorarlbergː FA Turnerbund Lustenau ==Amateur Championship Finals == ==Final table== Table mode (if points are tied): Number of wins - goal quotient Pl.
